tokens.text: validates world template icon format and placement

title: World Icon
description: Validates world template icons (world_icon.jpeg) for correct format, size, and placement. The icon is shown in the world selection screen.

fields.title: Missing Icon
fields.description: Warning when no world_icon.jpeg file is found in the world template. A world icon helps players identify the world in their list.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the world folder path missing the icon

fields.title: Multiple Icons
fields.description: Warning when multiple world icon files are found. Only one world_icon.jpeg should exist in the root of the world folder.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the paths to multiple icon files

fields.title: Invalid Format
fields.description: Error when the world icon file is not a valid image. The file must be a properly formatted JPEG image.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the invalid icon file

fields.title: Invalid Size
fields.description: Warning when the world icon is not the expected dimensions. World icons should be square (typically 256x256 or 128x128 pixels).
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the actual dimensions found
